title: Smartphone-based thermography in flap surgery: A systematic review and meta-analysis of perforator identification
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Loïc Van Dieren, Haïzam Oubari, Louise Callens, Yanis Berkane, Tom Quisenaerts, François Saget, Wiebren Tjalma, Gunther Steenackers, Curtis L. Cetrulo Jr, Alexandre G. Lellouch, Filip Thiessen EF
